simulation.lexicon

Class LimitedWeightsLexicon

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.lexicon.LimitedWeightsLexicon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Lexicon, WeightedLexicon

    public class LimitedWeightsLexicon
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightedLexicon
    A class of weighted lexicons in which association between things and words are weighted with values belonging to a closed and bounded interval of real numbers.
    See Also:
    SuccessCountingAgent, LimitedWeightsLexiconCreator, WeightedLexicon, ELCPaperSimulationCreator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LimitedWeightsLexicon(double minWeight, double maxWeight)
      Initializes this lexicon with the given bounds of weights of associations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LimitedWeightsLexicon

        public LimitedWeightsLexicon(double minWeight,
                             double maxWeight)
        Initializes this lexicon with the given bounds of weights of associations. All assocations in this lexicon are weighted with the values belonging to the interval [minWeight, maxWeight].
        Parameters:
        minWeight - the lower bound of weights in this lexicon
        maxWeight - the upper bound of weights in this lexicon

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Thing thing,
                Word word)
        Adds the association between the given thing and the given word weighted with maxWeight.
        Specified by:
        add in interface Lexicon
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing to be added in association with the given word to this lexicon
        word - a word to be added in association with the given thing to this lexicon

      • add

        public void add(Thing thing,
                Word word,
                double weight)
        Adds the association between the given thing and the given word with the given weight. If the given weight does not belong to [minWeight, maxWeight], the closest value to this weight from this interval is used.
        Specified by:
        add in interface WeightedLexicon
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing to be added in association with the given word to this lexicon
        word - a word to be added in association with the given thing to this lexicon
        weight - a weight of the added association

      • increaseWeight

        public void increaseWeight(Thing thing,
                           Word word,
                           double by)
        Increases the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word by the value of by, but no more than maxWeight.
        Specified by:
        increaseWeight in interface WeightedLexicon
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing from the association of which the weight should be increased
        word - a word from the association of which the weight should be increased
        by - value to increase the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word

      • decreaseOtherWeights

        public void decreaseOtherWeights(Thing thing,
                                 Word word,
                                 double by)
        Decreases the weight of all associations of the given thing except for the association with the given word by the value of by. If the weight of any association reduces to minWeight, then this association is removed from this lexicon, unless it was the last association of the given thing. If so, it is left with the weight of minWeight + 0.1.
        Specified by:
        decreaseOtherWeights in interface WeightedLexicon
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing of which associations should be included by this method
        word - a word from the association of which the weight should not be decreased
        by - value to decrease the weights of all associations of the given thing except for the association with the given word

      • decreaseWeight

        public void decreaseWeight(Thing thing,
                           Word word,
                           double by)
        Decreases the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word by the value of by. If the weight of this association reduces to minWeight, then this association is removed from this lexicon, unless it was the last association of the given thing. If so, it is left with the weight of minWeight + 0.1.
        Specified by:
        decreaseWeight in interface WeightedLexicon
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing from the association of which the weight should be decreased
        word - a word from the association of which the weight should be decreased
        by - value to decrease the weight of the association between the given thing and the given word

      • oneToOne

        public boolean oneToOne()
        Description copied from interface: Lexicon
        Returns true if each thing contained in this lexicon is associated with only one word. More formally, it returns true if this lexicon can be described as an injective function from the space of contained things to the space of words.
        Specified by:
        oneToOne in interface Lexicon
        Returns:
        true if each thing contained in this lexicon is associated with only one word; false otherwise.
